name: Recipes Made Simple: Strawberry Custard
description:
****Custard used in this recipe is Solub Arome Vanilla Custard not Sasami (SI)****

A Simple Strawberry Custard!!! A nice heavy custard with strawberry accents 7 to 10 day steep Enjoy!!!!
http://www.diymixerscrew.com
